__e: If he was harsh with me, it was only to make me a better man,
But you must realize that while, at times, you may not be my favorite student it does not mean that you are my least-favorite son.
But lately, and please don't judge me on this, but I want you to be the first to know that that there's a demon behind you.
I know you think me harsh, but as Queen you cannot always follow your heart.
well, as acting head of the household this weekend... I think you'II find me tough, yet fair.
She can be quite severe, yes, but there's nothing to be worried about.
In fact, she was such a disciplinarian that when my mom made parole, I was actually happy to see her.
There is no tougher audience than...
If I may, your Excellence... isn't there some better way, something not so drastic...
I know the officer you saw, he's the worst.
"... made the strongest speech in years..." "... directed to the unrest of recent weeks"
I guess I must have been a harsh boss... and father.
What I don't understand is how you can be so harsh and so mean to someone you love.
When I wanted to know more, he became very stern and asked me to keep out of it.
